localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Just as the Trello board revolutionized team collaboration by making it visual, simple, and fun for anyone, Trello’s new views are taking teamwork to places never seen before.
blogPost.body: Just as the Trello board revolutionized team collaboration by making it visual, simple, and fun for anyone, Trello’s new views are taking teamwork to places never seen before.
blogPost.title: The New Trello - Going beyond the board
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 正如Trello板通过使其可视化、简单化和对任何人来说都很有趣而彻底改变了团队协作，Trello的新视图正在将团队协作带到前所未有的地方。
正如Trello板通過使其可視化、簡單化和對任何人來說都很有趣而徹底改變了團隊協作，Trello的新視圖正在將團隊協作帶到前所未有的地方。

localize.full_text:
以75美元一个的价格出售10万个代币。他们是不可复制的。

以75美元一個的價格出售10萬個代幣。他們是不可複製的。

next.excerpt: Sherlock is a free Chrome plugin that analyzes price trends, permit history, sale history, demographics, quality of life, healthcare access, and more for every home on sale on Zillow and Redfin.
next.title: Sherlock by ZeroDown - Instant real estate insight

localize.description: Sherlock是一款免费的Chrome插件，它可以分析Zillow和Redfin上每一栋在售房屋的价格趋势、许可历史、销售历史、人口统计、生活质量、医疗服务等。
Sherlock是一款免費的Chrome插件，它可以分析Zillow和Redfin上每一棟在售房屋的價格趨勢、許可歷史、銷售歷史、人口統計、生活質量、醫療服務等。
